VERIFICATION

Verification is intended to assist the Chocolatey moderators and community
in verifying that this package's contents are trustworthy.

The embedded software have been downloaded from the listed download
location on <https://github.com/devopstales/kube-openid-connect/releases/latest>
and can be verified by doing the following:

1. Download the following:
  64-bit software: <https://github.com/devopstales/kube-openid-connect/releases/download/client_v1.0/kubectl-login_windows.zip>

2. Get the checksum using one of the following methods:
  - Using powershell function 'Get-FileHash'
  - Use chocolatey utility 'checksum.exe'

3. The checksums should match the following:

  checksum type: sha256
  checksum64: 54d49a39e690b794fea0736139b0d4e9c4533e2f2de155264aa4c5bac9b112d8

File 'LICENSE.txt' is obtained from <https://github.com/devopstales/kube-openid-connect/blob/main/LICENSEll>
